name: blinkit-mcp
description: Automate grocery shopping on Blinkit directly from Claude Desktop. Search, cart, and UPI payments.
long_description:
Blinkit MCP allows you to order groceries and essentials directly from Claude.

**Key Features:**
• **Smart Search**: Find products and view details
• **Cart Management**: Add items and manage your cart
• **UPI Payment Automation**: Select saved UPI IDs and pay instantly
• **Secure Login**: Phone number & OTP authentication with local session persistence

**Secure & Private** - Runs locally on your machine with Playwright.
